articles.title: Sri Lanka protesters, angered by economic crisis, storm president's house
articles.description: Thousands of Sri Lankan protesters stormed into the president's official residence in Colombo on Saturday, demanding his resignation as public anger grows over the country's worst economic crisis in seven decades.
